query:
----------------------
SELECT
FECHA, 
CASE ROUTERNAME

WHEN '5067-5150'      THEN 'TOSA GEN2CONSIGNED'
WHEN 'TPIC-10410-CM1' THEN 'TOSA PKG-GEN2CONSIGNED'
WHEN '5067-5009'      THEN 'TOSA GEN2(A4)'
WHEN 'TPIC-10410-A4'  THEN 'TOSA PKG-GEN2(A4)'
WHEN 'LR4G2WSIL'      THEN 'TOSA GEN 2 (B3)'
WHEN 'TPIC-10410-B4'  THEN 'TOSA PKG-GEN 2 (B3)'
WHEN '5067-5111'      THEN 'TOSA GEN 2.5'
WHEN 'TPIC-10410-D4'  THEN 'TOSA PKG-GEN 2.5'
WHEN '5067-5072'      THEN 'TOSA GEN 3'
WHEN 'TPIC-10410-AV1' THEN 'TOSA PKG-GEN 3'

WHEN '5067-5149'      THEN 'ROSA GEN 2 CONSIGNED'
WHEN 'RPIC-10410-CM1' THEN 'ROSA PKG-GEN 2 CONSIGNED'
WHEN '5067-5066'      THEN 'ROSA GEN 2 (A4)'
WHEN 'RPIC-10410-A4'  THEN 'ROSA PKG-GEN 2 (A4)'
WHEN 'LR4GEN2ROSA SHIM' THEN 'ROSA GEN 2 (B3)'
WHEN 'RPIC-10410-B4'  THEN 'ROSA PGK-GEN 2 (B3)'
WHEN '5067-5073'      THEN 'ROSA GEN 3'
WHEN 'RPIC-10410-AV1' THEN 'ROSA PKG-GEN 3'
             ELSE ROUTERNAME
 END "CODIGO"
, routername
,
 CASE OPERATION_TYPE
         WHEN 'SFCREL' THEN 'START'
         WHEN 'DONE' THEN 'OUT'
             ELSE 'NONE'
      END "OP", QTY
FROM(
SELECT
ORGANIZATION_CODE SITE_ID,
CASE WHEN txndate< TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(txndate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 06:30:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
THEN TO_CHAR(txndate-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
Else TO_CHAR(txndate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
END FECHA,
ITEM ROUTERNAME,
DEPARTMENT_CODE MFG_CENTER,
OPERATION_TYPE,
Sum (TRANSACTION_QTY) QTY
from apps.XXBI_CYP_ACTIVITY_LOG_V@osfm
where
ORGANIZATION_CODE = 'F07' AND
txndate>= to_date 
--
--
('011115 0630','MMDDYY HH24MI') AND txndate< to_date 
--
--
('011115 1830','MMDDYY HH24MI')
--
--
AND OPERATION_TYPE IN ('DONE','SFCREL') AND
DEPARTMENT_CODE like '%PIC-LR4%'
GROUP BY
ORGANIZATION_CODE,
CASE WHEN txndate< TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(txndate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 06:30:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
THEN TO_CHAR(txndate-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
Else TO_CHAR(txndate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
END,
ITEM,
DEPARTMENT_CODE,  
OPERATION_TYPE
)
order by op desc
